net.codemusic.smartears
Interface IRangeManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
RangeManager
public interface IRangeManager

This interface manages the set of pitch boundaries that keep the sounds played within a certain range

Method Summary
 int getLowerBound()
          This accessor method returns an int representing the MIDI note value of the lowest allowable pitch
 int getUpperBound()
          This accessor method returns an int representing the MIDI note value of the highest allowable pitch
 boolean isWithinRange(int note)
          Returns true if the supplied note is within the current range limitations and false otherwise
 int selectBase(IAnswer answer)
          returns a random base pitch that is within the current range
 void setLowerBound(int upperBound)
          This accessor method sets the MIDI note value of the lowest allowable pitch
 void setUpperBound(int top)
          This accessor method sets the MIDI note value of the highest allowable pitch

selectBase

public int selectBase(IAnswer answer)
               throws RangeException
returns a random base pitch that is within the current range

Returns:
a MIDI note value that can be used as the base note of this answer and keep all notes within the range
Throws:
a - RangeException if the answer's span is larger than the range
RangeException
